snippet.title: Silver Sonic: The Crystal Islands - OFFICIAL TRAILER (SHC2023)
snippet.description:
--| This version of the hack will be OBSOLETE once the new and improved Silver Sonic The Crystal Islands Refreshed! releases. I highly suggest you play the much more improved Refreshed! version then. Its trailer, which features download links, can be seen here https://youtu.be/5r67NGFNzPY |--
 
After defeating Robotnik and crashing his Death Egg, Silver Sonic meets up with Tails, who has discovered a brand-new species hailing from the Crystal Islands, the locating of the old Crystal Egg Zone where Robotnik was doing interdimensional teleportation experiments. And it turns out, there was one other Master Robot still active other than him, and this will be a quest to free her from her evil programming... This is the trailer for Silver Sonic: The Crystal Islands! 
Coming soon at the Sonic Hacking Contest 2023 in the Retro section.

Link: https://shc.zone/entries/contest2023/826
SOUNDTRACK: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GlLTVlFx3r4&list=PLlz_IM38S0l2KfK9SJWQxpvSFCkozaPrQ&pp=gAQBiAQB

If you enjoyed, please remember to like and subscribe!
BuyMeACoffee (Aka the place to give me small donations if you'd like to support me!): https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Roebloz
